dcterms:creator: Shreyas Hampali
Mahdi Rad
Markus Oberweger
Vincent Lepetit
dcterms:description: The dataset provides 3D hand-object annotations during interaction for markerless RGB images. The ground-truth annotations are obtained by fitting a hand model to multi-view RGB-D evidence.
dcterms:title: HO-3D

dcterms:creator: Christian Zimmermann
Duygu Ceylan
Jimei Yang
Bryan C. Russell
Max J. Argus
Thomas Brox
dcterms:description: FreiHAND consists of 130k training and 4k evaluation samples captured with a green screen background in the training set, as well as real backgrounds in the test set. Both 3D and 2D annotations are provided.
dcterms:title: FreiHAND

dcterms:creator: Christian Zimmermann
Max Argus
Thomas Brox
dcterms:description: HanCo does not contain 3D annotations. It only contains short video clips recorded with a calibrated and time-synchronized multi-view camera capture setup.
dcterms:title: HanCo

dcterms:creator: Dandan Shan
Jiaqi Geng
Michelle Shu
David F. Fouhey
dcterms:description: This is a large-scale and in-the-wild dataset of hand-object interaction footage. The dataset does not provide any hand annotation besides the bounding boxes of the hands in the scene.
dcterms:title: 100 Days Of Hands
